short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit posts to Peakaboo.  Created by Peakaboo, LLC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speeds up the submission process for peakaboo users when submitting LinkedIn posts.  When you submit a link, you receive a detailed Excel spreadsheet back with all the comments, hashtags, mentions, and engaged attendees.
